artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: From fashion periodical (P.15,216.1); woman with a white and pink gown with a yellow overgown, pink gloves, a green fan, and a yellow hat with pink bows and plumes with pink dots
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Plate II from Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Seconde Année, Vingt-sixième Cahier, 30 Juillet 1787
